Blog

Blog Opened[16 September 2013]

Blog opened at this date. Made with <love /> using the following big and small components:

  • jQuery
  • Pure
  • Font Awesome
  • Google Fonts
  • Google Analytics
  • Facebook Open Graph
  • Markdown
  • Jekyll
  • GitHub Pages
  • Disqus
  • GoDaddy
  • Adobe Photoshop
